document_name: Law 4643/2019 on Energy market liberalisation, PPC modernisation, DEPA privatisation and RES support and other provisions
document_description: This law aims at liberalising the Greek energy market, modernise the Public Power Corporation (PPC), privatise the Public Natural Gas Company (DEPA) and updates the support for renewable energy. It also transposes the EU Regulation 1227/2011 on Energy Market Integrity and Transparency. The document
